Enjoy an interactive experience with Alesso.
Follow the characters and participate in our collaborative videoclip uploading your 5 second video. You can win an exclusive trip where you will meet Alesso like a real VIP.

home.string:
IF IT WASN’T FOR YOU is the exclusive song created by Alesso for 212VIP CLUB EDITION.
Discover the official videoclip he has created for 212VIP of the perfect song for the perfect party. Do you want to take part in it?

upload_video.string: Now it’s time to upload your video.
Remember you can upload as many videos as you want.
Your video must be up to 5 seconds long, 16MB max and one of the following formats: MP4 OR MOV.
upload_video.stringMobile:
Your video must be up to 5 seconds long, 16MB max and one of the following formats: MP4 OR MOV.

If you have problems sending yout video directly from the camera, try to record it in lower quality or select an existing video from your gallery. If you're on an iOS device and still have problems with uploading your video, try Safari.

how.stringMobile:
HOW TO PARTICIPATE

COLLABORATIVE VIDEOCLIP

  • Register.
  • Just for registering you will receive an exclusive gift for true VIPs.
  • Choose your most VIP moment (DANCE, GET READY, KISS or SELFIE) and send us a 5 second video with it.
  • There is no limit, you can upload as many videos as you want.
  • The best will form part of the Alesso and 212VIP collaborative videoclip.
  • The Carolina Herrera panel will choose 3 winners to enjoy the grand prize: a trip to meet Alesso and attend his concert in true VIP style.

EAN CODE

  • Buy one of the 212 Carolina Herrera fragrances.
  • Register (if you haven’t already done so).
  • Click on the perfumes on the web page of this site.
  • Enter the code (EAN CODE), which you will find on the back of your 212 box.
  • Enter the draw for a VIP Experience, where you will be able to meet Alesso and enjoy his concert in style.

project.string: To herald the arrival of the new 212VIP CLUB Edition, music and fragrance unite in a unique concept, "THE PERFECT SONG FOR THE PERFECT PARTY". All we needed was the DJ of the moment to complete the mix.
Alesso, one of the most renowned DJs in the world, has created an exclusive for 212VIP, IF IT WASN’T FOR YOU. The song was unveiled at the latest Ultra Miami and has been doing the rounds ever since.
The official video is a 212 creation. Directed by Pensacola and produced by Canada, it was shot in Barcelona and Buenos Aires, where we went from one exclusive party to the next.
